scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第30集:秘议·幻焰蛾。

scenes.description: 绿裙女子森然说道,一定要在人族接应之前找到叛逆夺回神血。

visual.composition: Green-dressed woman says seriously, must find traitor and recover divine blood before humans respond

scenes.prompt: Green-dressed woman says seriously, must find traitor and recover divine blood before humans respond.
scenes.narration: 绿裙女子说道,必须在人族接应之前找到叛逆夺回神血。

scenes.description: 黄石公说道,叛逆已被打成重伤,还被下了感应标记,只要守住人族出口就逃不掉。

visual.composition: Huang Shigong says traitor is already heavily injured and marked, just guard human exit to catch him

scenes.prompt: Huang Shigong says traitor is already heavily injured and marked, just guard human exit to catch him.
scenes.narration: 黄石公说道,叛逆已重伤并被标记,守住人族出口就逃不掉。

scenes.description: 两名灵族低声商量一番后,灵光闪动,再次没入树木中不见了踪影。

visual.composition: Two spirit beings discuss in low voices, spirit light flashes, disappear into trees again

scenes.prompt: Two spirit beings discuss in low voices, spirit light flashes, disappear into trees again.
scenes.narration: 两名灵族低声商量后,灵光闪动,再次没入树木中消失不见。

scenes.description: 同一时间,落日城中的一间密室中,数名气度不凡之人围着一张石桌团坐。

visual.composition: Same time, in Sunset City secret chamber, several distinguished figures sit around stone table

scenes.prompt: Same time, in Sunset City secret chamber, several distinguished figures sit around stone table.
scenes.narration: 同一时间,落日城密室中,数名气度不凡之人围坐石桌商议。

scenes.description: 一名头陀对白袍中年人问道,那名灵族之人被困在落日之墓中,等着他们前去相救?

visual.composition: Head monk asks white-robed middle-aged man, is that spirit person trapped in Sunset Tomb waiting for rescue
visual.character_pose: Head monk asking, white-robed man listening

scenes.prompt: Head monk asks white-robed middle-aged man, is that spirit person trapped in Sunset Tomb waiting for rescue.
scenes.narration: 头陀问道,灵族之人被困在落日之墓中,等着他们前去相救。

scenes.description: 蓝城主缓缓说道,对方在逃亡途中被灵族追兵击成重伤,无法直接到落日城,需要接应。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan says calmly, the other was heavily injured by spirit pursuers during escape, can't reach Sunset City directly, needs rescue
visual.character_pose: City Lord Lan explaining, others listening

scenes.prompt: City Lord Lan says calmly, the other was heavily injured by spirit pursuers during escape, can't reach Sunset City directly, needs rescue.
scenes.narration: 蓝城主说道,对方被灵族追兵击成重伤,无法直接到城,需要接应。

scenes.description: 黑肤大汉开口问道,那名灵族人身上带着何物,竟然连黄粱前辈都被请出了山。

visual.composition: Black-skinned giant asks, what treasure does spirit person carry that even Huangliang Spirit Lord was invited

scenes.prompt: Black-skinned giant asks, what treasure does spirit person carry that even Huangliang Spirit Lord was invited.
scenes.narration: 黑肤大汉问道,灵族人身上带着何物,竟连黄粱前辈都被请出。

scenes.description: 一名身穿宽大黄袍,面色异常苍白的男子淡淡说道,他并非被请来,而是自己出府走走赶上了此事。

visual.composition: Man in wide yellow robe with extremely pale face says calmly, he wasn't invited but came out for walk and encountered this
visual.character_pose: Huangliang Spirit Lord speaking, others respectful

scenes.prompt: Man in wide yellow robe with extremely pale face says calmly, he wasn't invited but came out for walk and encountered this.
scenes.narration: 黄袍男子淡淡说道,他并非被请来,而是自己出府走走赶上了此事。

scenes.description: 蓝城主苦笑一声,他也不清楚灵族那人带来了何物,但收到的命令是圣皇宫传出来的。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan smiles bitterly, he doesn't know what spirit person brought, but command came from Saint Emperor Palace
visual.character_pose: City Lord Lan serious, others shocked

scenes.prompt: City Lord Lan smiles bitterly, he doesn't know what spirit person brought, but command came from Saint Emperor Palace.
scenes.narration: 蓝城主苦笑,不清楚灵族那人带来何物,但命令来自圣皇宫。

scenes.description: 头陀和大汉闻听此言都是一惊,圣皇宫的命令意味着此事是圣皇亲自关注的。

visual.composition: Head monk and giant are both shocked, Saint Emperor Palace command means Saint Emperor personally concerned

scenes.prompt: Head monk and giant are both shocked, Saint Emperor Palace command means Saint Emperor personally concerned.
scenes.narration: 头陀和大汉闻听此言都是一惊,此事是圣皇亲自关注的。

scenes.description: 就在蓝城主想说出灵族之人的藏身之地时,忽然黄粱真君单手向密室的一面墙壁上一抓。

visual.composition: Just as City Lord Lan wants to reveal spirit person's hiding place, Huangliang Venerable suddenly grabs at chamber wall with one hand

scenes.prompt: Just as City Lord Lan wants to reveal spirit person's hiding place, Huangliang Venerable suddenly grabs at chamber wall with one hand.
scenes.narration: 就在蓝城主想说出藏身之地时,黄粱真君突然向墙壁一抓。

scenes.description: 轰的一声,一只黄色晶手在墙前浮现而出,一把抓下,灰光一闪,什么东西被抓出。

visual.composition: Boom sound, yellow crystal hand appears before wall, grabs down, gray light flashes, something caught
visual.character_pose: Crystal hand grabbing, gray light visible

scenes.prompt: Boom sound, yellow crystal hand appears before wall, grabs down, gray light flashes, something caught.
scenes.narration: 黄色晶手浮现而出,一把抓下,灰光一闪,什么东西被抓出。

scenes.description: 噗嗤一声,那东西在晶手中爆裂开来,化为无数根灰丝,密密麻麻朝四面八方激射而去。

visual.composition: Puff sound, thing explodes in crystal hand, becomes countless gray threads shooting in all directions

scenes.prompt: Puff sound, thing explodes in crystal hand, becomes countless gray threads shooting in all directions.
scenes.narration: 那东西在晶手中爆裂,化为无数灰丝,密密麻麻朝四面八方激射。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君失声叫道:'不好,万魂丝!'随即袖袍一挥,大片黄霞翻滚而出,淹没了身形。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord exclaims: 'Bad, Ten Thousand Soul Threads!' Sleeves wave, yellow mist rolls out, covers figure

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord exclaims: 'Bad, Ten Thousand Soul Threads!' Sleeves wave, yellow mist rolls out, covers figure.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君失声叫道是万魂丝，随即黄霞翻滚而出，急忙防御。

scenes.description: 其他人也全都大惊失色,头陀急忙将佛珠化为一团团黑云护住全身,黑肤大汉取出一面黝黑铁盾挡在身前。

visual.composition: Others also shocked, head monk quickly turns prayer beads into black clouds protecting body, giant takes out black iron shield
visual.character_pose: All defending, shields and clouds visible

scenes.prompt: Others also shocked, head monk quickly turns prayer beads into black clouds protecting body, giant takes out black iron shield.
scenes.narration: 其他人也大惊失色,头陀佛珠化黑云护体,大汉取出铁盾挡在身前。

scenes.description: 漫天灰丝在众人防御之前灵光一闪,全都变淡消失不见了,所有人都不禁怔住了。

visual.composition: Countless gray threads flash before everyone's defense, all fade and disappear, everyone stunned

scenes.prompt: Countless gray threads flash before everyone's defense, all fade and disappear, everyone stunned.
scenes.narration: 漫天灰丝在防御前灵光一闪,全都变淡消失,所有人都不禁怔住。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君最先反应过来,抬手一招,黄色晶手飞射过来,只见晶手表面多出一些银色粉末。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord reacts first, raises hand, yellow crystal hand flies over, sees silver powder on surface

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord reacts first, raises hand, yellow crystal hand flies over, sees silver powder on surface.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君抬手一招,黄色晶手飞回,只见表面多出一些银色粉末。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君说道,是成熟体的幻焰蛾分身,有一缕分神借机逃遁掉了,其本体一定就在落日城附近。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord says, it's mature Phantom Flame Moth clone, a wisp of soul escaped, true body must be near Sunset City

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord says, it's mature Phantom Flame Moth clone, a wisp of soul escaped, true body must be near Sunset City.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君说道,是成熟体幻焰蛾分身,有一缕分神逃遁,本体就在附近。

scenes.description: 蓝城主脸色变得难看之极,说道明天就出发,决不能让妖族之人抢先了。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan's face becomes extremely ugly, says will depart tomorrow, must not let demon race people get ahead

scenes.prompt: City Lord Lan's face becomes extremely ugly, says will depart tomorrow, must not let demon race people get ahead.
scenes.narration: 蓝城主脸色难看,说明天就出发,决不能让妖族之人抢先。

scenes.description: 一个时辰后,离落日城百里之外的一座无名小山的山腰处,一名容貌清秀的少年盘坐在山石上。

visual.composition: One hour later, on mountainside of unnamed small hill a hundred li from Sunset City, handsome young man sits on rock

scenes.prompt: One hour later, on mountainside of unnamed small hill a hundred li from Sunset City, handsome young man sits on rock.
scenes.narration: 一个时辰后,离落日城百里外的无名小山,清秀少年盘坐山石上。

scenes.description: 在其头顶上,却有一只拳头大小的彩色飞蛾,双翅轻轻扇动着,散发着艳丽异常的点点灵光。

visual.composition: Above his head, colorful moth size of fist, wings flapping gently, emitting brilliant spirit light

scenes.prompt: Above his head, colorful moth size of fist, wings flapping gently, emitting brilliant spirit light.
scenes.narration: 头顶上一只拳头大小的彩色飞蛾,双翅轻扇,散发着艳丽的灵光。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第31集即将开始。
